record.field: Purchase Order Whatsapp: Send by email
${object.company_id.name} ${object.state in ('draft', 'sent') and 'Request For Quotation' or 'Order'} (Ref ${object.name or 'n/a' })

p.ul:
% if object.company_id.purchase_order_information_in_message: Dear ${object.partner_id.name} ,%0A%0A Here is the your Order *${object.name}* amounting in ${object.amount_total} ${object.currency_id.symbol} from ${object.company_id.name} %0A%0A
% endif
% if object.company_id.purchase_product_detail_in_message:
Following is your order details. %0A%0A
%for line in object.order_line:
*${line.name}* %0A *Qty:* ${line.product_uom_qty} %0A *Price:* ${line.price_unit}$ %0A ________________________ %0A%0A % endfor
*Total Amount:* %20 ${object.amount_total} ${object.currency_id.symbol} %0A%0A % endif
% if object.company_id.po_send_pdf_in_message:
*Click here to download Report* %20 :${object.purchase_url} %0A%0A % endif
% if object.company_id.purchase_signature and object.env.user.sign :
%20 ${object.env.user.sign} %0A%0A % endif
